from(android.content.Context).Description: Get a @B_android#support#v4#hardware#fingerprint#FingerprintManagerCompat_E@ instance for a provided context.

Returns: true if hardware is present and functional, false otherwise.
isHardwareDetected().Description: Determine if fingerprint hardware is present and functional.

Returns: true if at least one fingerprint is enrolled, false otherwise
hasEnrolledFingerprints().Description: Determine if there is at least one fingerprint enrolled.

ClassDesc: A class that coordinates access to the fingerprint hardware. On platforms before https:##developer#android#com@B_android#os#Build#VERSION_CODES#M_E@, this class behaves as there would be no fingerprint hardware available.
